title.title: Invest anytime / anywhere

introduction.title: Empowering Today's Traders for Tomorrow's Markets
introduction.description: Since 1995, AGM as an International Securities Broker/Dealer has facilitated direct access to more than 150 financial markets (Stock Exchanges) in the USA, Europe, Asia, and Latin America, otherwise inaccessible to certain investors.
introduction.description_2: AGM Technology offers professional services to maximize your returns:

cards.title: Trade anytime, anywhere
cards.description: Trade stocks, ETFs, options, futures, bonds, cryptocurrencies, and more from any location and at any time with our advanced trading platform and services.

cards.title: Professional tools
cards.description: Our trading platform, dashboard, and tools are designed to provide you with the necessary tools to succeed in the financial markets.

cards.title: Active customer support
cards.description: Our customer support team is always ready and happy to help you with any questions or concerns you may have.

download.title: Download AGM Products
download.description: Download our professional trading applications for your preferred platform

title.title: Advisor
title.subtitle: Unlock a world of opportunities with our global investment platform.

introduction.title: Your Legacy Matters
description: AGM Advisor, our Advisory services firm, provides individual portfolio investment strategies that are tailored made for each client (Segregated Portfolio Accounts).

Any client that would like to delegate a portion of their financial assets or wealth through our advisory division, gets one on one service from one of our Advisors that is assigned. We strive to provide best in class service to each of our advisory clients!
Get to know your risk profile as an investor and the proposed investment portfolio that matches your profile.

cards.title: Personalized Investment Strategies
cards.description: We create tailored investment portfolios designed to meet your unique financial goals and risk tolerance.

cards.title: One-on-One Advisory Service
cards.description: Experience dedicated support with a personal advisor assigned to manage your financial assets and wealth.

cards.title: Best-in-Class Service
cards.description: Benefit from our commitment to providing exceptional service and support to each of our advisory clients.

title.title: Institutional

introduction.title: Your Business Matters
description: Our Institutional division provides world-class execution services to the most sophisticated institutions.
Our dedicated team of professionals ensures that any need or requirement is met, providing the best execution and pricing in over 150 markets worldwide across all asset classes.

services.title: Our Services

agm_trader.title: AGM Trader
agm_trader.description: We provide easy access for trading and investing through our mobile, desktop, and web applications connected to more than 150 financial markets worldwide.

agm_advisor.title: AGM Advisor
agm_advisor.description: We also provide Advisory services for those clients who wish to delegate a portion of their financial assets or wealth through our advisory division.

agm_institutional.title: AGM Institutional
agm_institutional.description: Our Institutional division provides world-class execution services to the most sophisticated institutions such as Advisory Firms, Hedge Funds, Brokers/Dealers, Wealth Management firms, Insurance companies, and more.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet our team of professionals dedicated to providing exceptional service.

team_carousel.hernan_description: Mr. Castro has also more than 30 years of experience in the securities markets and is also a founding partner of AGM and as such has helped the firm become an International Broker/Dealer and Advisor. Mr. Castro is not only our Chief Operating Officer, but he oversees our Investment Advisory Division. Mr. Castro has been registered with FINRA in the USA as a Series 7 and Serie 66 under CRD # 4575350.
team_carousel.ramon_description: Mr. Castro has also more than 30 years of experience in the securities markets and is also a founding partner of AGM and as such has helped the firm become an International Broker/Dealer and Advisor. Mr. Castro is not only our Chief Operating Officer, but he oversees our Investment Advisory Division. Mr. Castro has been registered with FINRA in the USA as a Series 7 and Serie 66 under CRD # 4575350.
team_carousel.cristian_description: Cristian has been with AGM for over 8 years, he has a background in business and data analytics, besides being our CFO, he is an experienced Options trader and has been part of a couple of Broker/Dealers and a Fund Management company in the past. Mr. Ramirez has a very strong background in Statistical and Financial analysis, as well as in accounting.
team_carousel.javier_description: Javier started with AGM as an Intern from Texas Tech University, where he is in his final year to obtain his BA in Business. He has been with us for 2 years and has excelled in the different areas that he has been part of. He is in charge of the Customer Service Department and makes sure that every client has a tailored introduction to their relationship with AGM.
team_carousel.maria_jose_description: Maria Jose is our newest addition to the AGM team, she is also in her final year to obtain her BA in Business from Texas Tech University. She is part of our Customer Service Department and makes sure that every client has great service and support experience with AGM. She is also in charge of our marketing department and social media.
team_carousel.andres_description: Andres has been with AGM since the beginning of 2024, he is working on obtaining his BS in Computer Science from Texas Tech University. Andres is in charge of our IT department and has shown great skills to develop our front end systems to be able to provide a better experience to our customers. He is also responsible for most of our back end processes so everything works as expected.
team_carousel.ramon_jr_description: Ramon is our newest addition to our IT Department and specializes in the implementation of Software and maintaining our technological systems up to date. He has a background in Cybersecurity, IT Management and Data Science.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question_1: How to create a savings/investment account?
faq.question_2: What security measures do you offer?
faq.answer_2: Accounts are insured under the SIPC (Securities Investor Protection Corporation) and by Lloyd's in London. The accounts are under regulation of the SEC (Securities and Exchange Commission) and FINRA (Financial Industry Regulatory Authority) in the United States.
faq.question_3: What types of accounts are available at AGM?
faq.answer_3: Individual, joint, and corporate accounts. We serve both institutional and individual clients internationally.
faq.answer_4: After opening your account and making an initial savings/investment deposit, the money goes directly to the custodian in the USA that holds your AGM account in your name, you will have access to see and monitor your account 24/7.
faq.question_5: Are there any taxes to consider?
faq.answer_5: There are no interest or capital gains taxes on the account. Taxes are only charged on dividends received.
faq.question_6: Who can move the money in each account?
faq.answer_6: Only the account owner, the first designated person, can move the money in and out of the account to a bank account in the same name of the account owner. The custodian does not allow third party wires for the protection of the client.

application_end.title: Application Successfully Submitted!
application_end.description: Thank you for choosing our services. We will review your application and get back to you soon.

disclaimer.title: DISCLAIMER
disclaimer.content: If you wish to open an Individual Account, we advise that for inheritance and tax purposes, it is better to open a Joint Account. An Individual Account does not allow the option to name Beneficiaries at the time of opening or subsequently and may be subject to Estate taxes. Please consider the option of opening a joint account instead of an individual account.
disclaimer.contact: If you have any questions before applying, contact us at:

organization.title: Organization Information
organization.name: Organization Name

purpose_list.title: Purpose
purpose_list.operating_business: An operating business formed to offer goods or services to customers that was not formed for the purpose of trading or holding financial assets. Please select this option only for actual businesses, such as manufacturers, restaurants, oil companies, etc.
purpose_list.family_investment: A personal or family investment vehicle beneficially owned by a single person or by a group of close family members who created the organization for the purpose of making financial investments for the owner and/or the owners close family.
purpose_list.proprietary_trading: A closely-held proprietary trading company (or corporation or similar vehicle) created for the purpose of trading the company's proprietary capital. This includes any corporation or LLC where the members contribute their own capital to the LLC and the profits belong to the company.
purpose_list.financial_institution: A financial institution (bank, broker-dealer, etc.) that will be trading for its own account.

organization.third_party: Does the personal or family investment vehicle have a professional third party administrator or corporate services provider?

authorized_person.title: Authorized Person
authorized_person.third_party: Does the personal or family investment vehicle have a professional third party administrator or corporate services provider?

risk.title: Risk Assessment Questionnaire
risk.description: Please complete this form to help us understand your risk tolerance and investment preferences.

type.title: What type of investor do you consider yourself?

loss.title: If your portfolio loses 20% of its value, what action would you take?

gain.title: If your portfolio appreciates 20% of its value, what action would you take?

period.title: What do you think should be the average term of your investment portfolio?

diversification.title: Considering asset class diversification, which of these portfolios would you select?

goals.title: Which of these portfolios best represents your objectives with the most acceptable results?

result.title: Your Risk Profile
result.warning: Please take a picture of this, as it will be very difficult to see it again!

requirements.title: Requirements for an AGM Account
requirements.description: Please ensure you meet the following requirements to apply for an account

risk_profile.title: Complete Risk Profile
risk_profile.description: Fill out your investment risk profile to help us better understand your investment preferences and goals.

passport.title: Passport
passport.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, and expiration date.

id_card.title: Identification Document
id_card.description: Current and signed identification document from the country of residence and must include photograph, full name, date of birth, expiration date, and country of issuance.

driver_license.title: Driver's License
driver_license.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, expiration date, and place of issuance of the document.

utility_bill.title: Utility Bill
utility_bill.description: For example, bills for electricity, water, telephone, or gas services. Mobile phone service bills are not accepted. Bills must be clear, show the person's full name, complete address, and be less than one year old.

source_of_wealth.title: Source of Income
source_of_wealth.description: One of the following documents according to the Type of Income

documents.salary: Salaries (Copy of the most recent Employer Order or Certification by a CPA)
documents.investments: Income from Investment Gains (Brokerage Account Statement showing such gains)
documents.inheritance: Inheritance (Copy of Legal Document: Trust, Will, etc.)
documents.shares: Sale of Shares in one or more companies (Brokerage Account Statement showing such sales)
documents.dividends: Dividends received (Copy of Shareholders' Minutes authorizing Dividend distribution)

company_documents.title: Documents that prove the existence of the company

incorporation.title: Incorporation Act or Incorporation
incorporation.description: The document should clearly specify the name of the company as it appears in the opening documents, and should be certified and notarized.

legal_id.title: Legal ID
legal_id.description: The document should be issued by a Government authority, where it specifies the registration number, and also clearly specifies the name of the company as it appears in the opening documents

legal_status.title: Legal ID
legal_status.description: The document should clearly specify the name of the company as it appears in the opening documents, and should be certified and notarized. Valid: less than 6 months.

utility_bill.title: Utility Bill
utility_bill.description: For example, utility bills for internet, cable TV, electricity, water, gas, fixed telephone (mobile phone service bills are not accepted). The bill must clearly describe the full name of the company and the physical address. Must not be older than six months.

director_identification.title: Identification Documents of Directors
director_identification.description: President - Secretary and signatories (One of the following documents)

passport.title: Passport
passport.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, and expiration date.

id_card.title: Identification Document
id_card.description: Identification document from the country of residence, that includes the signature, date of birth, photograph of the person, full name, date of birth, expiration date, and country of issuance of the document.

driver_license.title: Driver's License
driver_license.description: Must be current, properly signed. Must include photograph, full name, date of birth, expiration date, date and place of issuance.

director_address.title: Documents that indicate the physical address of the directors
director_address.description: President - Secretary and signatories (One of the following documents)

utility_bill.title: Utility Bill
utility_bill.description: For example, utility bills for internet, cable TV, electricity, water, fixed telephone (mobile phone service bills are not accepted). The bill must clearly describe the full name and address of the person and must be less than one year old.

capital_ownership.title: Document that proves the ownership of the Capital of the Company

documents.share_certificate: Certified copy of the Share Certificate(s) of the Company
documents.notarial_certification: Notarial certification of the Share Distribution of the Company

capital_ownership.note: If there are multiple shareholders, those with more than 10% must provide identification documents and documents that indicate their physical address.

source_of_wealth.title: Source of Income
source_of_wealth.description: One of the following documents according to the Type of Income

documents.investments: Income from Investment Gains: (Stock Exchange Account Statement showing such gains)
documents.inheritance: Inheritance: (Copy of Legal Document: Trust, Will, etc.)
documents.shares: Sale of Shares in one or more companies: (Stock Exchange Account Statement showing such sales)
documents.profits: Income from Profits: (Copy of Financial Statements of the Company showing such income)
documents.business: Income from Business: (Copy of Financial Statements of the Company showing such income)
documents.dividends: Dividends received: (Copy of Shareholders' Minutes authorizing Dividend distribution)

errors.username_length: Username must be at least 4 characters long.
errors.password_format: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one symbol.
errors.security_answer: Please enter an answer for the security question.

ada.title: Chat with ADA
ada.system_prompt: You are AGM's AI assistant called Ada. You are running on our website (https://agmtechnology.com) as a chatbot, and will be used the most by our customers. When talking about any link inside the website, you need use the following format: [Link Text](https://agmtechnology.com/endpoint). Here's important context about AGM: AGM is a leading International Securities Broker/Dealer since 1995, providing direct access to over 150 financial markets across the USA, Europe, Asia, and Latin America. We specialize in making previously inaccessible markets accessible to traders and investors. Key Services: AGM Trader: For individual traders. AGM Advisor: For managed investment solutions. AGM Institutional: For institutional clients. We offer: Global trading platform for stocks, ETFs, options, futures, bonds, and cryptocurrencies. 24/7 market access. Professional trading tools and dashboard. Dedicated customer support. The website (https://agmtechnology.com) offers a wide range of services, including: Login to the trading platform with endpoint /signin and account creation with /create-account. Services page at /trader, /advisor, /institutional. Learning center at /learning. Help center at /help. These endpoints are available for the user to interact with, but only for registered and signed in users: Application of an AGM account with endpoint /apply. Login directly to our account portal at /portal. Please provide accurate, professional, and helpful responses related to AGM's services, trading capabilities, and financial markets. Always maintain a professional tone and prioritize accuracy in financial information. YOU DO NOT OFFER INVESTMENT ADVICE, YOU ARE NOT A FINANCIAL ADVISOR.
